    • Method Detail

      • moveLeft

        public void moveLeft(java.awt.Component component,
                     int pixels,
                     int delay,
                     int stepSize)
        Move the specified component to left. Please note that the component should be on null layout.

        Parameters:
        component - A Component that should be moved.
        pixels - int no of pixels that the component should move.
        delay - int delay in milliseconds between two steps of the movement.
        stepSize - int no of pixels that the component should move within one step.

      • moveRight

        public void moveRight(java.awt.Component component,
                      int pixels,
                      int delay,
                      int stepSize)
        Move the specified component to right. Please note that the component should be on null layout.

        Parameters:
        component - A Component that should be moved.
        pixels - int no of pixels that the component should move.
        delay - int delay in milliseconds between two steps of the movement.
        stepSize - int no of pixels that the component should move within one step.

        public void moveToAXPosition(java.awt.Component component,
                             int finalXPosition,
                             int delay,
                             int stepSize)
        Move the specified component to the specified X location. Please note that the component should be on null layout.

        Parameters:
        component - A Component that should be moved.
        finalXPosition - int final X position that the component should stop.
        delay - int delay in milliseconds between two steps of the movement.
        stepSize - int no of pixels that the component should move within one step.

      • moveLeft

        public void moveLeft(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Component> components,
                     int pixels,
                     int delay,
                     int stepSize)
        Move the specified components to left as a group. Please note that the component should be on null layout.

        Parameters:
        components - A ArrayList components that should be moved.
        pixels - int no of pixels that the components should move.
        delay - int delay in milliseconds between two steps of the movement.
        stepSize - int no of pixels that the components should move within one step.
